shortDescription: The Iron Sparrow has dispatched all of his remaining units to attack the vault's northmost entrance, Commander. Hold them off until the Liao Reserves arrive to relieve you.
longDescription: Unpleasant as Subcommander Tianyu may be, he's getting his vault, SLDF Griffin and all. Our reputation with House Liao is worth more than a single 'Mech.

objectiveList.title: Defend the Vault from the Iron Sparrow's Forces
Escort the Combat Engineer APCs to the Turret Control Center
objectiveList.description: Escort Engineer APCs to Base Defenses in order to take control of them.

objectiveList.title: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance
objectiveList.description: Hidden Objective: Destroy the Third Lance

dialogueContent.words: The Iron Sparrow's forces are converging on the vault's northmost entrance point, Commander. Doubtless, they were hoping to catch you by surprise. Ready yourselves, they'll be on you soon enough.
We've got it covered, Subcommander Tianyu.

You don't know how wrong you are. When I catch up with your lance, I'm gonna have my people pull your pilots out of their 'Mechs. And then I'm gonna show you what happens to individuals who cross the Iron Sparrow.
All right, Commander… you win. I give up. I didn't get where I am today by not knowing when to break off a fight.
Run, then. Flee like the coward you are.
One man's cowardice is another man's wisdom. I'm smart enough to know when I'm beaten, Tianyu. Enjoy your victory while you can, I'll take it out of your hide later.
A terrible disappointment, Commander. But the Liao Reserves will succeed where you have failed.
NOT USED IN THIS FLASHPOINT - CHUNK TURNED OFF.
Warning commander, sensors are reading multiple contacts approaching from multiple vectors. Looks like the attacking force has brought reinforcements.
Be advised, some of the target buildings are sustaining damage. Your mission is to keep them standing.
Commander, a target building has been demolished. Ensure the integrity of the remaining buildings.
Only one building is still standing, you fool! If the Iron Sparrow brings it down, this whole campaign will be over!

Mercenary Commmander, we've recieved word of the assault on your position. Reinforcements are incoming, they are about halfway there. Maintain position and you will be relieved and reinforced shortly.
NOT USED IN THIS FLASHPOINT - CHUNK TURNED OFF.
